byline.original: By AL BAKER and ROB HARRIS

abstract: Two men pushed their way into an apartment on East 51st Street, bound the occupants and escaped with cash and jewelry.
snippet: Two men pushed their way into an apartment on East 51st Street, bound the occupants and escaped with cash and jewelry.

headline.main: A Gun, 'Don't Look at My Face,' and Then They Hit the Safe
headline.print_headline: Two Robbers, One Armed, Force Their Way Into Turtle Bay Home
